info.title: API Documentation
info.description: API documentation for the Laravel application

get.description: Retrieve a list of articles with optional filters for keyword, date, category, and source. Results are paginated.

parameters.name: keyword
parameters.description: Search for articles by keyword in the title

title.example: Breaking News: Euro Hits All-Time High

content.example: The Euro reached a record high today.

get.summary: Get a specific article by ID
get.description: Retrieve the details of a specific article by its ID.

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: The ID of the article to retrieve

title.example: Breaking News: Euro Hits All-Time High

content.example: The Euro reached a record high today.

post.description: This endpoint registers a new user by accepting their name, email, and password.
Authenticate a user and return a Bearer token on successful login.
Send a password reset link to the user's email address if it exists in the system.

message.example: Password reset link sent to your email

post.description: Reset a user's password using a valid token and email. The token expires after 60 minutes.
Logs out the authenticated user by revoking all tokens.

get.description: Retrieve the preferences of the authenticated user, including preferred sources, categories, and authors.

post.description: Update or create the preferences of the authenticated user, including sources, categories, and authors.

get.description: Retrieve a list of personalized news articles based on the authenticated user's preferences (sources, categories, and authors).

title.example: Marcus Fakana: Briton, 18, sentenced over Dubai sex with girl, 17

description.example: Marcus Fakana has been jailed for a year over the relationship, a campaign group in Dubai says.
